altTitles.ja: スワッピングパーティー！？
スワッピングパーティー！！

description.en:
The protagonist fell asleep during the welcoming party at his part-time job.
When he opened his eyes, the shop manager and his busty senior coworker were having sex!
Even more, he gets a lewd invitation from Yuzu, the female staff member who he secretly has feelings for☆
Sex under special circumstances will take his breath away!

(Source: FANZA)

tl;dr The employees and the owner of a small cafe bar — all in all two men and two women — form two couples and get swept up in group sex shenanigans.

1. Swapping Party!? (スワッピングパーティー！？)
2. Swapping Party!! (スワッピングパーティー!!)

Note: Ch. 1 is vanilla, Ch. 2 contains swinging/partner swapping just as the title says, so consider yourself warned if this is not your cup of tea.

| Namespace | Tags |
| :- | :- |
| male | condom, hairy, sweating, virginity |
| female | ahegao, big breasts, blowjob, collar, defloration, drunk, exhibitionism, hairy, handjob, hidden sex, lingerie, nakadashi, sweating, swinging, twintails |
| mixed | group, vanilla (ch.1) |
description.ja:
バイト先の歓迎会で眠ってしまった主人公。
目を覚ますと店長と爆乳の先輩がSEXをしていた――！？
さらに密かに想いを寄せていた女性スタッフ・ゆずからエッチなお誘いをされてしまい……☆
特殊な状況でのセックスに息を呑むっ！

biography.en:
This is the H-mangaka Ame Arare.

Not to be confused with the shoujo & josei mangaka, [Ame Arare (飴あられ)](https://mangadex.org/author/bcaf76fc-58b0-4d87-bc2f-85937edfa27f)

**Native name**: 雨あられ

**Alt. names**:
